product.description: Linkrunner is an AI-driven Mobile Measurement Partner (MMP) that allows businesses to meticulously track the performance of their distribution channels, from initial click through to download and user onboarding.

features.name: Channel Performance Tracking
features.description: Enables detailed monitoring of top-performing distribution channels.

features.name: Granular Metrics
features.description: Tracks performance down to every click, download, and onboarding event.

features.name: AI-Driven Analysis
features.description: Leverages artificial intelligence for insights into channel effectiveness.

product.targeted_market: Mobile app developers, marketers, and businesses focused on user acquisition and retention through various distribution channels. This includes companies looking to optimize their marketing spend and understand the true ROI of their efforts.
product.problem_product_is_solving: The difficulty in precisely attributing user acquisition and engagement to specific marketing channels. It addresses the lack of granular data on user journey (from click to onboarding) and the inability to identify the most effective distribution strategies, leading to potentially wasted marketing resources.
